comment: Weekly short writings super easy.
Professor Kyle was a great teacher in that he set clear criteria. I felt his workload was perfect for a one credit hour course and the final paper was interesting. Would highly recommend.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: This was a tough course! However, I really appreciate how he teaches statistics as if you didn't take a course on it beforehand. For IET 3404 he is a solid choice.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Lecture heavy

comment: Awesome Professor. He explains everything very well. Put in the work and you will get a guaranteed A.
Amazing professor. He teaches you the concepts and how to use them in the field. If its on his test then he talked about it in class. Take him for every class that you can.
He teaches the how, the why and made stat's understandable. If you make anything lower than a B its because your just lazy.

One of the best professors I've taken to this day. Unlike other teachers, he tells you only what you need to know and nothing else. He doesn't waste your time and wants students to succeed. 3 tests make up most of your grade, but he allows you to take them home for a week. No reason to fail unless you slack off yourself. TAKE HIM

BEST PROFESSOR!!! Any chance you get to take him, do it! Class is not mandatory but he makes his lectures fun, upbeat and relatable. Don't buy the book unless he tells you. He is very respectful of your time. He usually only give 3 test, which are all take home. You will have to listen back through the lectures but all the answers are there.

Mark Kyle is by far the best college professor that I have had. His class outline is to the point ( 3 take home test, with one week to complete), his grading criteria is always listed, and he is funny. I feel though it isn't a waste of time to be in his class, and he always ensures that he is using class time well.  - Would Take Again
Very experienced and knowledgable.   Very helpful and wants you to learn.  Tests are long, difficult, and time consuming.  They are take home tests, but not easy.  Start on tests ASAP!

Lots of experience in the industry so has a lot of anecdotes to make the material more understandable and he's overall a really helpful and nice guy. Class was three take-home (not d2l) tests and a group project but the tests weren't all from the book, needed to go over the lectures. Does teach as if you already know quite a bit and can be unclear.
There are three tests. The last one is also the final. You can use the book on these. Not too bad, but it is a little dry. The professor is good. There is a paper you have to do.

I have taken Prof. Kyle for 3 classes: IET 3356, IET 3339 & IET 3403. I have never had an easier class than these. He makes life extremely easy and straightfoward. For IET 3403, he gives a takehome exams. His practice questions are pretty much the exam but with different numbers. So, same exact querstions, different numbers.

Class can be a little tough but he'll give u one take home exam out of 3. Each test is worth 30%. Must attend class to get 10% for attendance. Duh? very easy guy. Works for GE. so, he doesnt like to complicate work for his students. TAKE HIM!

For IET 3356, All tests are multiple choice and also, TAKE HOME. Tests are very time consuming - start on it as you recieve it. I took this class online and didnt even break a sweat. VERY EASY CLASS! TAKE HIM
Great teacher! Real World stuff. Tests are take but not easy. You need the book,but if you spend the time on it an A is no problem.

Excellent Professor.  Open book take home tests.  Tests will take many hours to complete.  Professor presents material very clearly.  Lots of material to read.  I would recommend taking this professor for other classes.
Excellent Professor.  Open book take home tests.  Tests will take many hours to complete.  Professor presents material very clearly.  Lots of material to read.

Excellent! A S.Poly grad too! He is very straightforward and wastes none of your time. He gives you plenty of material to learn on your own, in case you missed class. His work prepares you perfectly for his tests too. Only complaint is that he used the book from a different class for some of the homework.

Every professor should be like this guy. Very good teacher. Presents the material very clearly. Test are over exactly what's covered in class. Take him for as many classes as you can. He works in industry knows his stuff!! Not the typical "I counldn't cut it in the private sector so I decided to teach" guys.
Great Teacher. Excellent infact.!! He is interesting and knows his stuff well.

Kyle is hands down the best professor in IET, maybe the whole school. He does not waste your time. More than fair in grading. Excellent. I have taken 5-6 classes with him now. Register for him if you can.

All tests are open book and open note. Tests are just like the homework. If you understand the homework, you'll at least make a strong B on the test. Mark is very clear in his lectures, tells you exactly what you need to know.
Probably the best teacher I've ever had. Take him if you can! Very fair and an overall great person to be around.
Excellent, excellent teacher! I can't say enough good things about Mr. Kyle. Take him if you can.
No Comments
